children.description: content rendered inside the Tab content area. (React component or element)

className.description: additional classes added to the Tab

href.description: URL associated with the Tab. A Tab with an href will render as an <a> instead of a <button>. A Tab inside a <Tabs component="nav"> should have an href.

parentInnerRef.description: Parents' innerRef passed down for properly displaying Tooltips (Type: React.Ref<any>)

tabContentRef.description: child reference for case in which a TabContent section is defined outside of a Tabs component (Type: React.Ref<any>)
